items.title: Student Led Mission Designs Highlight The Challenges Of Engineering In Space

items.title: Intel's fancy new AI tool measures image quality in games in real time, so upscaling artifacts and visual nasties have nowhere to hide
items.summary: Intel's new AI tool is able to measure image quality in games in real time, effectively identifying upscaling artifacts and visual imperfections. This tool aims to quantify subjective aspects of image quality, providing a innovative solution for improving visual quality in gaming.

items.summary: Rowan Street Capital released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter detailing its investment journey with Spotify (SPOT).

items.title: Intel, Indeed, Glassdoor Total 5,000+ Layoffs. Is Your Job AI-Proof?
items.summary: Intel, Indeed, and Glassdoor are cutting 5,000+ roles, raising concerns about the impact of AI on job security. Learn about the types of jobs being replaced by AI, why the layoffs are happening, and how to future-proof your career in the face of automation.

items.title: NetBox Labs raises $35m to modernise infrastructure operations
items.summary: NetBox Labs raises $35m in second funding round to modernize infrastructure operations, as companies seek to improve deployment, management, and security of business-critical networks and infrastructure.

items.summary: Bloom is a habit tracking application powered by AI that integrates with Siri and iCloud to help users develop and sustain positive habits.

items.title: LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models Explained
items.summary: LoRA is a new technique for efficient fine-tuning of large language models by updating fewer parameters. It offers benefits such as faster adaptation, but also has limitations that need to be addressed. The research explores its real-world uses and potential for the future.

items.title: 'Sleeping With That Fear…': Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas On Staying Ahead In The AI Race

items.title: Presentation: Making Augmented Reality Accessible: A Case Study of Lens in Maps
items.summary: Ohan Oda discusses making the Lens in Maps AR feature accessible to visually impaired users, sharing valuable lessons on designing inclusive AR experiences and the impact on users.

items.summary: Elon Musk promotes having more babies but also creates digital girlfriends through Grok, potentially discouraging real relationships and reproduction.

items.title: Hackers Are Finding New Ways to Hide Malware in DNS Records
items.summary: Hackers have found new ways to hide malware in DNS records, exploiting the domain name system to conceal malicious code and prompt injection attacks against chatbots.

items.title: Quantum code breaking? You'd get further with an 8-bit computer, an abacus, and a dog
